relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented x3; in pain.
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus; mucus membranes moist.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm; no murmurs/rubs/gallops.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally; excursions reduced bilaterally.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-distended; very tender to palpation in the right lower quadrant (RLQ) and left lower quadrant (LLQ); rebound tenderness and guarding in the RLQ and LLQ; mildly tender diffusely; no evidence of diffuse peritonitis.
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema; warm and well perfused.
